name: Light Of My Life
description:
A small firefly named Lumo was left behind when his family had to suddenly flee their tree trunk home. Alone in the dark, he must follow the messages his family left behind and use their Light to find his way.

This game was developed and primarily designed for Windows. I do not have a Mac to test with, so I apologize if there are any issues!

Unfortunately, due to some time zone issues we weren't able to finish the art for the second level in time. Hope you enjoy grey blocks.
Thanks to Noura for staying up super late to get it done! You may notice some grey blocks sticking out in the second level - this is to provide guidance for where the platforms are in case the visuals are slightly misaligned due to a lack of testing time! If you already downloaded the game, feel free to download again and check out the visuals!
